text: Jean-Charles Corbet is a French Chief executive officer and aviator. == Biography == Graduates from École nationale de l'aviation civile (ÉNAC) of Toulouse (airline pilot promotion 1974Book 50 ans d'Enac au service de l'aviation page 352), he starts his career as air transport pilot in Gabon, waiting to be hired by Air France. Airline pilot at Air France, he is First officer on Boeing 737 and 747, and then Captain on Airbus A320 before being qualified on Airbus A340. Air Lib: deux ans ferme contre Corbet Head of the Air France section of the Syndicat national des pilotes de ligne, he is causing a ten-day strike at Air France, just before the 1998 FIFA World Cup. Jean-Charles Corbet, l'ancien patron d'Air Lib à la barre In 2001, he is president of Air Lib, Prison ferme confirmée pour l'ex-pdg d'Air Lib airline borns with the merger of AOM French Airlines and Air Liberté. L'ancien PDG d'Air Lib condamné à un an et demi de prison ferme Amateur rugby union Quand Jean-Charles Corbet éblouissait le Rugby Club and air sports, Jean-Charles Corbet is also an accomplished motorcyclist. == References == Category:Living people Category:French aviators Category:Alumni of the École nationale de l'aviation civile Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:French businesspeople
title: Jean-Charles Corbet
